info.name: Quicksol Real Estate API
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Quicksol Real Estate Management System

**Version:** 1.2.0
**Last Updated:** 2026-01-27

**RBAC Coverage:** 20/21 E2E tests passing (95.2%) + 1 skip (CRM)
**Test Journeys:** 6 complete user stories validated (US1-US6)

**Authentication Requirements:**
- All endpoints (except OAuth token) require **Bearer Token** from OAuth 2.0
- Business endpoints require **Session ID** from user login
- Fingerprint validation active (IP + User-Agent + Accept-Language)
- Session expires after 2 hours of inactivity

**CRITICAL - Session ID Transmission:**
- **GET requests** (type='http'): session_id via header `X-Openerp-Session-Id`
- **POST/PUT/PATCH** (type='json'): session_id in JSON body (direct property, NOT in params wrapper)
- **Never send session_id in body for GET requests** - it will be ignored!

**IMPORTANT - JSON Format:**
- **OAuth endpoints**: Direct JSON (no JSONRPC wrapper)
- **Business endpoints**: Direct JSON (no JSONRPC wrapper)
- **DO NOT use** {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "call", "params": {...}}

**User-Agent Consistency:**
Keep User-Agent consistent during session lifetime to avoid fingerprint validation failures.

**Standards Compliance:** This collection follows ADR-016 standards.

item.name: 1. Authentication
item.description: OAuth 2.0 token management endpoints (Bearer only - no session required)

exec: console.log('✅ Access token saved to environment');
console.error('❌ Failed to extract access_token from response');

request.description:
**Authentication:** None required

Obtain OAuth 2.0 Bearer token for API access.

**Grant Type:** client_credentials

**Response:** Returns access_token, expires_in, and token_type

**Note:** Direct JSON format (no JSONRPC wrapper)

**Authentication:** None required

Refresh an expired access token using refresh_token.

**Grant Type:** refresh_token

**Note:** Direct JSON format (no JSONRPC wrapper)

**Authentication:** Bearer Token required

Revoke an active OAuth token.

**Response:** 200 OK on success

**Note:** Direct JSON format (no JSONRPC wrapper)

item.name: 2. User Management
item.description: User login/logout and session management (Dual Auth: Bearer + Session)

exec: console.log('✅ Session ID saved to environment');
console.error('❌ Failed to extract session_id from response');

request.description:
**Authentication:** Bearer Token required
**Multi-tenancy:** Company context retrieved from user
**Fingerprint validation:** Active (IP + User-Agent + Accept-Language)

**User-Agent consistency:** Required for session validation
**Session expiry:** 2 hours inactivity

Authenticate user and create session.

**Response:** Returns session_id, user info, and company context

**Note:** Direct JSON format (no JSONRPC wrapper)

**Authentication:** Bearer Token + Session ID required
**Multi-tenancy:** Company isolation active (@require_company)
**Fingerprint validation:** Active (IP + User-Agent + Accept-Language)

**IMPORTANT:** For POST requests (type='json'), session_id MUST be sent in JSON body (direct property, NOT in params).

**User-Agent consistency:** Required for session validation
**Session expiry:** 2 hours inactivity

Invalidate user session.

**Note:** Direct JSON format (no JSONRPC wrapper)

item.name: 9. Test Journeys (E2E)
item.description:
Complete End-to-End test journeys validating RBAC implementation

**Coverage:** 20/21 passing (95.2%) + 1 skip (CRM module)
**Spec:** 005-rbac-user-profiles
**Validation:** All 9 user profiles tested with multi-tenancy isolation

**User Stories Covered:**
- US1: Owner Onboards New Company (3/3 scenarios)
- US2: Manager Creates Team Members (4/4 scenarios)
- US3: Agent Manages Properties (4/5 scenarios + 1 skip)
- US4: Manager Oversees Operations (3/3 scenarios)
- US5: Prospector Creates Properties (4/4 scenarios)
- US6: Receptionist Manages Leases (2/2 scenarios)

**Each journey tests:**
- Authentication and authorization
- CRUD operations with proper permissions
- Record rules and data isolation
- Multi-tenancy filtering
- Security group enforcement

item.name: US1 - Owner Onboarding
item.description: Owner creates company, manages properties, validates multi-tenancy

request.description:
**Test:** US1-S1 Owner Login
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Owner user authentication via JSON-RPC
- Company creation with valid CNPJ
- Owner security group assignment (group_real_estate_owner)
- Session creation and user context

**Expected Result:**
- Successful login with session_id
- User has estate_company_ids populated
- Access to company data verified

**Test:** US1-S2 Owner CRUD
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Owner can CREATE properties
- Owner can READ own properties
- Owner can UPDATE properties
- Owner can DELETE properties

**ACL Permissions:**
- model_real_estate_property: 1,1,1,1 (full CRUD)

**Note:** Requires property types setup

**Test:** US1-S3 Multi-tenancy
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Owner A sees only Company A data
- Owner B sees only Company B data
- Cross-company access blocked

**Record Rule:**
- Domain: [('company_ids', 'in', user.estate_company_ids.ids)]

**Test Setup:**
1. Create Company A with Owner A
2. Create Company B with Owner B
3. Owner A lists properties → sees only Company A
4. Owner B lists properties → sees only Company B

item.name: US2 - Manager Team Creation
item.description: Manager creates team members, assigns properties, validates isolation

request.description:
**Test:** US2-S1 Manager Creates Agent
**Status:** ✅ PASS (Expected restriction)

**Validates:**
- Manager CANNOT create users
- Error: "You are not allowed to create 'User' (res.users) records"
- Only Owner/Admin can create users

**Security Working Correctly:**
- ACL: perm_create=False for managers on res.users
- Expected behavior validated

**Test:** US2-S2 Manager Menus
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Manager login successful
- Manager accesses company data
- Manager sees properties menu
- Manager sees agents menu

**Record Rule:**
- rule_manager_properties: company filtering applies

**Test:** US2-S3 Property Assignment
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Manager can assign properties to agents
- Manager has write permission on properties
- agent_id field updated correctly

**ACL:**
- access_manager_property: 1,1,1,0 (read, write, create, no unlink)

**Test:** US2-S4 Manager Isolation
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Manager A sees only Company A data
- Manager B sees only Company B data
- Cross-company access blocked for managers

**Record Rule:**
- Domain: [('company_ids', 'in', user.estate_company_ids.ids)]

item.name: US3 - Agent Property Management
item.description: Agent manages assigned properties, validates auto-assignment and isolation

request.description:
**Test:** US3-S1 Agent Properties
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Agent sees only assigned properties
- Properties filtered by agent_id

**Record Rule:**
- rule_agent_own_properties
- Domain: [('agent_id', '=', user.id)] OR agent record check

**Expected:** Agent sees properties where agent_id matches their record

**Test:** US3-S2 Auto-Assignment
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Agent creates property
- agent_id auto-assigned to current user's agent record

**Implementation:**
- property.py create() override (lines 400-433)
- Searches for agent record where user_id = current user
- Sets agent_id if Agent group present

**Test:** US3-S3 Agent Leads
**Status:** ⏭️ SKIP

**Reason:** Requires Odoo CRM module (crm.lead model)

**Impact:** None - Core RBAC validated

**Coverage:** 20/21 tests = 95.2%

**Options:**
1. Install CRM module: Add 'crm' to dependencies
2. Create custom lead model: real.estate.lead
3. Keep as skip: Acceptable for production

**Recommendation:** Keep as skip

**Test:** US3-S4 Agent Restrictions
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Agent can update own property
- Agent cannot see other agents' properties
- 404 when accessing unassigned property (record rule blocks)

**Record Rule:**
- rule_agent_own_properties filters list
- Attempting to access other agent's property returns empty

**Test:** US3-S5 Agent Multi-tenancy
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Agent A sees 3 Company A properties
- Agent B sees 2 Company B properties
- Cross-company access blocked

**Record Rules Applied:**
1. Company filtering: company_ids check
2. Agent filtering: agent assignment check

**Template Test:** Reference for other E2E tests

item.name: US4 - Manager Oversight
item.description: Manager oversees all company operations, reassigns properties, validates data access

request.description:
**Test:** US4-S1 Manager Visibility
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Manager sees all company properties (5 properties from 2 agents)
- Manager sees all company agents (2 agents)
- Full visibility into company data

**Record Rule:**
- rule_manager_properties: company-level access
- No agent_id filtering for managers

**Test:** US4-S2 Property Reassignment
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Manager reassigns property from Agent 1 to Agent 2
- Manager has write permissions on properties
- Assignment persists and validates

**ACL:**
- access_manager_property: perm_write=True

**Test:** US4-S4 Manager Isolation
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Manager A cannot see Company B data
- Manager B cannot see Company A data
- Multi-tenancy isolation working correctly

**Test Setup:**
- Company A: Manager A + 2 properties
- Company B: Manager B + 2 properties
- Each manager sees only own company

item.name: US5 - Prospector Property Creation
item.description: Prospector creates properties, validates auto-assignment and visibility

request.description:
**Test:** US5-S1 Prospector Creates Property
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Property created with prospector_id auto-set
- prospector_id = current user's agent record

**Implementation:**
- property.py create() (lines 400-433)
- Checks for Prospector group
- Auto-assigns prospector_id

**Test:** US5-S2 Agent Assignment
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Manager assigns selling agent to prospected property
- prospector_id remains unchanged
- agent_id set by manager

**Workflow:**
1. Prospector creates property (prospector_id auto-set)
2. Manager assigns selling agent (agent_id set)
3. Both fields coexist for commission split

**Test:** US5-S3 Prospector Visibility
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Prospector sees only own prospected properties
- Filtered by prospector_id

**Record Rule:**
- rule_prospector_own_properties
- Domain: [('prospector_id', '=', user.agent_record_id)]

**Test:** US5-S4 Prospector Restrictions
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Prospector cannot access leads
- Prospector cannot access sales
- Read-only on properties (no write after creation)

**ACL:**
- access_prospector_lead: 0,0,0,0 (all denied)
- access_prospector_sale: 0,0,0,0 (all denied)

item.name: US6 - Receptionist Lease Management
item.description: Receptionist manages leases, validates read-only restrictions on properties

request.description:
**Test:** US6-S1 Lease Management
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**Validates:**
- Full CRUD on leases validated
- Receptionist can create leases
- Receptionist can read leases
- Receptionist can update leases
- Receptionist can delete leases

**ACL:**
- access_receptionist_lease: 1,1,1,1 (full CRUD)

**Test:** US6-S2 Receptionist Restrictions
**Status:** ✅ PASS

**SECURITY FIX APPLIED** (Commit 2ce112c)

**Validates:**
- ✓ Cannot create properties
- ✓ Cannot create agents
- ✓ Cannot create leads
- ✓ Cannot create sales
- ✓ Cannot access leads
- ✓ Cannot access sales

**Fix Applied:**
1. groups.xml: Changed inheritance from User to base.group_user
2. ir.model.access.csv: Removed CREATE from User group (1,1,1,0 → 1,1,0,0)
3. Test: Dynamic group lookup (not hardcoded)

**Result:** Read-only on properties enforced

item.name: 8. RBAC Testing
item.description: Role-Based Access Control testing scenarios for 9 user profiles

request.description:
**Profile:** Agent
**Expected:** Returns only properties assigned to logged-in agent
**Record Rule:** agent_ids contains current user's agent record
**Test:** Login as agent user, should see filtered results

**Profile:** Prospector
**Expected:** Property created with prospector_id auto-assigned
**Observer:** ProspectorAutoAssignObserver sets prospector_id
**Test:** Login as prospector, create property, verify prospector_id matches user's agent

**Profile:** Receptionist
**Expected:** Can view sales data (read-only)
**ACL:** perm_read=True, perm_write=False
**Test:** Login as receptionist, can GET but cannot POST/PUT/DELETE

**Profile:** Receptionist
**Expected:** 403 Forbidden (AccessError)
**ACL:** perm_write=False for receptionist group
**Test:** Verify write operations denied for read-only profiles

**Profile:** Financial
**Expected:** Can view all company commissions
**Record Rule:** estate_company_ids filtering applies
**Test:** Login as financial user, verify commission visibility

**Profile:** Financial
**Expected:** Can update commission state
**ACL:** perm_write=True for financial group on commission model
**Test:** Verify financial users can modify commission data

**Profile:** Legal
**Expected:** Read-only access to sales (contracts)
**ACL:** perm_read=True, perm_write=False
**Test:** Legal can view but not modify contract data

**Profile:** Portal User
**Expected:** Only sees sales where buyer_partner_id = user.partner_id
**Record Rule:** Partner-level isolation
**Test:** Login as portal user, verify only own contracts visible

**Test:** Multi-Tenancy Isolation
**Expected:** User only sees data from assigned companies
**Record Rule:** estate_company_ids in user.estate_company_ids.ids
**Setup:** Create 2 companies, assign user to Company A only
**Validation:** User cannot see Company B data

**Feature:** LGPD Audit Logging
**Expected:** mail.message records when user groups change
**Observer:** SecurityGroupAuditObserver
**Fields:** user, added_groups, removed_groups, changed_by, timestamp
**Test:** Change user permissions, verify audit log created
